mapper.sql: article_id, a_master_id, a_type, a_publish_date, a_abort_date, a_img, a_url, a_create_time, a_title, a_update_time,a_read_amount,a_delete,a_add_type

a.article_id, a.a_master_id, a.a_type, a.a_publish_date, a.a_abort_date, a.a_img, a_url, a.a_create_time, a.a_title, a.a_update_time,a.a_read_amount,it.img_tmp_id,it.it_type, it.it_url,it.it_app_path,it.it_is_userd,it.it_size,a.a_delete,a_add_type

m.master_id, m.m_nick,m.m_sex, m.m_status, m.m_head_img, m.m_constellation, m.m_country_code, m.m_tel, m.m_password, m.m_address, m.m_business_type, m.m_label, m.m_bargain, m.m_follows, m.m_deals, m.m_score, m.m_create_time, m.m_update_time, m.m_deleted,m.m_device_id,m.m_im,m.m_token,m.m_device_type,m.m_introduction
mapper.select:
select
,
,
from tf_article a LEFT JOIN tf_img_tmp it ON a.article_id=it.it_key_id LEFT JOIN tf_master m ON a.a_master_id=m.master_id where a.article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.a_create_time desc

select
,
,ifnull(cn.cn_user_id,0) as isCollection
from (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM tf_article where 1=1
and a_master_id = #{tfArticle.aMasterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a_delete=false order by
a_create_time desc,a_read_amount desc ) a1
WHERE
FIND_IN_SET(#{item},a_type)
limit #{startNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageStartSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) a LEFT JOIN tf_img_tmp it ON a.article_id=it.it_key_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tf_collection c WHERE c.`cn_user_id`=#{tfArticle.queryUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.`cn_type`=2) cn ON cn.`cn_article_id`=a.`article_id`
order by
a.a_create_time desc,a.a_read_amount desc

mapper.update:
update tf_article
a_master_id = #{aMasterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
a_type = #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_title = #{aTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_publish_date = #{aPublishDate,jdbcType=DATE},
a_abort_date = #{aAbortDate,jdbcType=DATE},
a_img = #{aImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_url = #{aUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_create_time = #{aCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a_update_time = #{aUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a_read_amount = #{aReadAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
a_content = #{aContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
a_delete = #{aDelete,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
a_add_type = #{aAddType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tf_article set a_master_id = #{aMasterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_type = #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_title = #{aTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_publish_date = #{aPublishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, a_abort_date = #{aAbortDate,jdbcType=DATE}, a_img = #{aImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_url = #{aUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_create_time = #{aCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_update_time = #{aUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_read_amount = #{aReadAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, a_delete = #{aDelete,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, a_content = #{aContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, a_add_type = #{aAddType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
